full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 462 Filed 11/15/21 Page 25 of 32 Juror ID: 47. Witnesses in this case may testify claiming sexual abuse or sexual assault. Would you have any difficulty assessing the credibility of a witness claiming sexual assault or abuse just like you would any other witness? Yes No 47a. If yes, please explain: 48. Have you or a friend or family member ever been the victim of sexual harassment, sexual abuse, or sexual assault? (This includes actual or attempted sexual assault or other unwanted sexual advance, including by a stranger, acquaintance, supervisor, teacher, or family member.) Yes (self) Yes (friend or family member) No 48a. If yes, without listing names, please explain: 48b. If your answer to 48 was yes, do you believe that this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case? Yes No 48c. If yes to 48b, please explain: -24- DOJ-OGR-00007041

text_blocks.content: 47. Witnesses in this case may testify claiming sexual abuse or sexual assault. Would you have any difficulty assessing the credibility of a witness claiming sexual assault or abuse just like you would any other witness? Yes No

48. Have you or a friend or family member ever been the victim of sexual harassment, sexual abuse, or sexual assault? (This includes actual or attempted sexual assault or other unwanted sexual advance, including by a stranger, acquaintance, supervisor, teacher, or family member.) Yes (self) Yes (friend or family member) No
48a. If yes, without listing names, please explain:
48b. If your answer to 48 was yes, do you believe that this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case? Yes No

additional_notes: The document appears to be a juror questionnaire related to a court case involving sexual abuse or assault allegations. The document is well-structured and legible, with clear headings and checkboxes for responses.
